mapper.sql: t_house_property_building_unit.id, t_house_property_building_unit.building_id AS buildingId, t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id AS designModelId, t_house_property_building_unit.unit_code AS unitCode, t_house_property_building_unit.area as area, t_house_property_building_unit.direction AS direction
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_property_building_unit.* FROM t_house_property_building_unit WHERE t_house_property_building_unit.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_property_building_unit.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_property_building_unit
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_property_building_unit.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.building_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.buildingId},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.designModelId},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.unit_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.unitCode},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.direction LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.direction},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_property_building_unit.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}

SELECT t_house_property_building_unit.*
, t_house_design_model.house_type AS houseType
, t_house_property_community.community AS communityName , t_house_property_building.`code` As buildingCode
FROM t_house_property_building_unit
JOIN t_house_design_model ON t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id = t_house_design_model.id
JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building_unit.building_id = t_house_property_building.id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_building.community_id = t_house_property_community.id
WHERE t_house_property_building_unit.id = #{entity.id} GROUP BY t_house_property_building_unit.id
